title: What are the things that will come in trend in year 2020? - Quora
tags: India 2020: A Vision A Millennium Ago (1998 book)

response.answer_text: More automation, especially at restaurants. Orders will be taken by machines, especially at fast food restaurants.Less retail shops as online shopping replaces the need to go to stores.More automated banking that will replace tellers.Uber and Lyft will make most taxi services obsolete.Government services like car registrations will negate the need to visit a person due to online technology.Manufacturing will lose more jobs to computer automation than loss to foreign manufacturing.Family farms will continue to dwindle in favor of large-scale commercial farms.High tech devices are replacing the need to see a doctor. Many devices can allow a patient to self-diagnose.Automation in sports that will reduce the need for umpires and referees. In baseball there will be the first use of computers to call balls and strikes.More camera surveillance to reduce crime but will come with a loss in privacy. Eventually every street will be monitored.Automation in schools that will replace teachers and books.Of course, fashions will come and go but as we need to travel outside the home less, there will be a decline in revenues.Demand for high-skilled jobs will increase and manual labor and service jobs are declining. Plan accordingly. Whether you get paid $7.25 or $15 per hour at a fast food restaurant or a retail store, your job will soon be replaced by automation. Be prepared and adapt or become extinct.

Hi, Being an adornments devotee I want to discuss the evident shift in consumer’s buying behavior related to the mid-high jewelry segment. It has been an intense year for all because the flare-up of coronavirus has influenced the adjustments in the pattern definitely. Which has further accelerated the decrease in the demand of the fine jewelry market. The pattern has moved toward the fast moving, trend changing, elegant & smart office wear and casual designs which are not very expensive but offer high value in terms of quality, durability and most importantly aesthetics. It’s a change in trend from platinum / gold jewelry, studded with diamonds to 925 Sterling Silver studded with equally appealing and on various occasions much attractive gemstones which one can afford at just 5-10% the cost of its predecessor. Diamond rings (top row) range- $1500 to $6500  Gemstone rings (bottom row) range- $80 to $450 Picture credit: Google The modern consumer has accepted that the gemstones offer better coverage in terms of colors, cut and design dimensions than the precious diamonds which one can just afford a couple of times in his/her lifetime. The pattern of putting resources into valuable metal has dropped at an extraordinary rate. The purchasing limit has diminished because of the expansion in joblessness because of the pandemic, people have started valuing money more than ever and have started purchasing and investing smartly. The ongoing overview asserts that individuals lean toward wearing gemstone adornments as their day to day wear as they have given a different and a much better dimension and value to jewelry that the diamonds and the other fine jewelry couldn’t provide. Henceforth individuals have begun to pick gemstones as their every day & special day adornments. In the coming years the gemstone adornments will confront an extraordinary increment and will turn into a more favored jewelry. Gemstones have mending capacities and furthermore look popular. As of late modern consumers have begun considering wedding bands made of gemstones instead of diamonds. As there are numerous gemstones that look more stunning than diamonds and cost much less. This can cause an immense grade in the valuable and semi-valuable jewels market.
